document_data.mainbody:
Hlargrim Sturnshon was the proprietor of the Dryads Dreams, the only festhall in Mosstone, Tethyr in the mid-to-late-14 century DR.
Hlargrim was a hardy man with an open-mind.
Hlargrim Sturnshon was a forester by trade and after a long career, the retired and became the owner of the Dryads Dreams festhall in Mosstone that he ran along with his lovely daughters, Braetha, Kalaeria, Charethra, Hestroone, and five others.
